WITH daily_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    DATE("createdAt") as metric_date,
    COUNT(*) as total_appointments,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN "status" = 'CONFIRMED' THEN 1 END) as confirmed_appointments,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN "status" = 'CANCELLED' THEN 1 END) as cancelled_appointments,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN "status" = 'COMPLETED' THEN 1 END) as completed_appointments,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN "status" = 'NO_SHOW' THEN 1 END) as no_show_appointments,
    AVG("duration") as avg_duration,
    COUNT(DISTINCT "patientId") as unique_patients,
    COUNT(DISTINCT "doctorId") as active_doctors
  FROM "Appointment" 
  WHERE DATE("createdAt") = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day'
  GROUP BY DATE("createdAt")
),
specialty_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    s."name" as specialty_name,
    COUNT(a.*) as appointment_count,
    AVG(a."duration") as avg_duration
  FROM "Appointment" a
  JOIN "Specialty" s ON a."specialtyId" = s."id"
  WHERE DATE(a."createdAt") = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day'
  GROUP BY s."id", s."name"
),
queue_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(*) as total_in_queue,
    AVG(EXTRACT(DAY FROM (NOW() - "createdAt"))) as avg_wait_days,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN "priority" = 'EMERGENCY' THEN 1 END) as emergency_queue,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN "priority" = 'HIGH' THEN 1 END) as high_priority_queue
  FROM "QueueEntry"
  WHERE "status" = 'WAITING'
)
SELECT 
  'daily_summary' as metric_type,
  json_build_object(
    'date', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day',
    'appointments', json_build_object(
      'total', COALESCE(ds.total_appointments, 0),
      'confirmed', COALESCE(ds.confirmed_appointments, 0),
      'cancelled', COALESCE(ds.cancelled_appointments, 0),
      'completed', COALESCE(ds.completed_appointments, 0),
      'no_show', COALESCE(ds.no_show_appointments, 0),
      'avg_duration', COALESCE(ds.avg_duration, 0),
      'confirmation_rate', CASE 
        WHEN COALESCE(ds.total_appointments, 0) > 0 
        THEN ROUND((COALESCE(ds.confirmed_appointments, 0) * 100.0 / ds.total_appointments), 2)
        ELSE 0 
      END,
      'no_show_rate', CASE 
        WHEN COALESCE(ds.total_appointments, 0) > 0 
        THEN ROUND((COALESCE(ds.no_show_appointments, 0) * 100.0 / ds.total_appointments), 2)
        ELSE 0 
      END
    ),
    'patients', json_build_object(
      'unique_patients', COALESCE(ds.unique_patients, 0),
      'active_doctors', COALESCE(ds.active_doctors, 0)
    ),
    'queue', json_build_object(
      'total_waiting', COALESCE(qs.total_in_queue, 0),
      'avg_wait_days', COALESCE(qs.avg_wait_days, 0),
      'emergency_queue', COALESCE(qs.emergency_queue, 0),
      'high_priority_queue', COALESCE(qs.high_priority_queue, 0)
    )
  ) as metrics
FROM daily_stats ds
FULL OUTER JOIN queue_stats qs ON true

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'specialty_breakdown' as metric_type,
  json_agg(
    json_build_object(
      'specialty', specialty_name,
      'appointments', appointment_count,
      'avg_duration', avg_duration
    )
  ) as metrics
FROM specialty_stats

WITH notification_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    DATE("sentAt") as metric_date,
    "channel",
    COUNT(*) as total_sent,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN "status" = 'delivered' THEN 1 END) as delivered,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN "status" = 'failed' THEN 1 END) as failed,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN "status" = 'read' THEN 1 END) as read_count
  FROM "NotificationLog" 
  WHERE DATE("sentAt") = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day'
  GROUP BY DATE("sentAt"), "channel"
),
reminder_effectiveness AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(a.*) as total_reminders_sent,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN a."status" = 'CONFIRMED' THEN 1 END) as confirmed_after_reminder,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN a."status" = 'NO_SHOW' THEN 1 END) as no_show_despite_reminder
  FROM "Appointment" a
  JOIN "NotificationLog" nl ON a."id" = nl."appointmentId"::uuid
  WHERE DATE(nl."sentAt") = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day'
    AND nl."type" = 'reminder'
)
SELECT 
  'notification_summary' as metric_type,
  json_build_object(
    'date', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day',
    'by_channel', json_agg(
      json_build_object(
        'channel', channel,
        'total_sent', total_sent,
        'delivered', delivered,
        'failed', failed,
        'read_count', read_count,
        'delivery_rate', CASE 
          WHEN total_sent > 0 
          THEN ROUND((delivered * 100.0 / total_sent), 2)
          ELSE 0 
        END,
        'read_rate', CASE 
          WHEN delivered > 0 
          THEN ROUND((read_count * 100.0 / delivered), 2)
          ELSE 0 
        END
      )
    ),
    'reminder_effectiveness', (
      SELECT json_build_object(
        'total_sent', total_reminders_sent,
        'confirmed_after', confirmed_after_reminder,
        'no_show_despite', no_show_despite_reminder,
        'effectiveness_rate', CASE 
          WHEN total_reminders_sent > 0 
          THEN ROUND((confirmed_after_reminder * 100.0 / total_reminders_sent), 2)
          ELSE 0 
        END
      )
      FROM reminder_effectiveness
    )
  ) as metrics
FROM notification_stats

WITH workflow_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(*) as total_executions,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN "status" = 'success' THEN 1 END) as successful_executions,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN "status" = 'error' THEN 1 END) as failed_executions,
    AVG("executionTime") as avg_execution_time
  FROM "WorkflowExecution" 
  WHERE DATE("executedAt") = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day'
),
api_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(*) as total_requests,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN "statusCode" >= 200 AND "statusCode" < 300 THEN 1 END) as successful_requests,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN "statusCode" >= 400 THEN 1 END) as error_requests,
    AVG("responseTime") as avg_response_time
  FROM "APILog" 
  WHERE DATE("timestamp") = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day'
),
user_activity AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(DISTINCT "userId") as active_users,
    COUNT(*) as total_sessions
  FROM "UserSession" 
  WHERE DATE("createdAt") = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day'
)
SELECT 
  'system_performance' as metric_type,
  json_build_object(
    'date', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day',
    'workflows', (
      SELECT json_build_object(
        'total_executions', COALESCE(total_executions, 0),
        'successful_executions', COALESCE(successful_executions, 0),
        'failed_executions', COALESCE(failed_executions, 0),
        'success_rate', CASE 
          WHEN COALESCE(total_executions, 0) > 0 
          THEN ROUND((COALESCE(successful_executions, 0) * 100.0 / total_executions), 2)
          ELSE 0 
        END,
        'avg_execution_time_ms', COALESCE(avg_execution_time, 0)
      )
      FROM workflow_stats
    ),
    'api', (
      SELECT json_build_object(
        'total_requests', COALESCE(total_requests, 0),
        'successful_requests', COALESCE(successful_requests, 0),
        'error_requests', COALESCE(error_requests, 0),
        'success_rate', CASE 
          WHEN COALESCE(total_requests, 0) > 0 
          THEN ROUND((COALESCE(successful_requests, 0) * 100.0 / total_requests), 2)
          ELSE 0 
        END,
        'avg_response_time_ms', COALESCE(avg_response_time, 0)
      )
      FROM api_stats
    ),
    'users', (
      SELECT json_build_object(
        'active_users', COALESCE(active_users, 0),
        'total_sessions', COALESCE(total_sessions, 0)
      )
      FROM user_activity
    )
  ) as metrics

WITH weekly_summary AS (
  SELECT 
    DATE_TRUNC('week', "createdAt") as week_start,
    COUNT(*) as total_appointments,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN "status" = 'COMPLETED' THEN 1 END) as completed_appointments,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN "status" = 'NO_SHOW' THEN 1 END) as no_show_appointments,
    COUNT(DISTINCT "patientId") as unique_patients,
    AVG("duration") as avg_duration
  FROM "Appointment" 
  WHERE "createdAt" >= DATE_TRUNC('week', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days')
    AND "createdAt" < DATE_TRUNC('week', CURRENT_DATE)
  GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('week', "createdAt")
)
SELECT 
  json_build_object(
    'week_start', week_start,
    'week_end', week_start + INTERVAL '6 days',
    'total_appointments', total_appointments,
    'completed_appointments', completed_appointments,
    'no_show_appointments', no_show_appointments,
    'unique_patients', unique_patients,
    'avg_duration', avg_duration,
    'completion_rate', ROUND((completed_appointments * 100.0 / total_appointments), 2),
    'no_show_rate', ROUND((no_show_appointments * 100.0 / total_appointments), 2)
  ) as weekly_metrics
FROM weekly_summary
